Articles.Content: Why was the forum member list disabled? I viewed it not even three days ago and went to revisit it today, and the function is marked as disabled. Was something brewing? (If this post is unwanted attention, I'd ask for a mod to please close / delete it and message me privately to lemme know to hush.)

Honestly, not sure. None of the admins are about at the moment, and they're the only ones likely to know. I double checked, just to make sure it wasn't that it had only been disabled for regular members, but I can't get to it either.

I'll let you know if I can find out one way or another. If I had to guess, I'd say Kasper or one of the others is probably temporarily disabling forum functions to better cope with the increased server load that comes with the days following new releases of KSP.

If I had to guess, I'd say Kasper or one of the others is probably temporarily disabling forum functions to better cope with the increased server load that comes with the days following new releases of KSP.

That's it

We'll restore the full functionality of the forums soon - possibly later today depending on traffic.
I think I'm developing clairvoyant powers over here these days.
